caption.p: Effect of experimental treatments and infection with E. tenella on the relative ratio of body weight gain of birds at 7 d postinoculation. (R1g, R3g, and R5g represent 2, 4, and 6 g RN/kg diet, respectively, Sacox: 66 mg salinomycin/kg diet, PC and NC: basal diet with and without coccidiosis challenge, respectively. Different lowercase letters indicate significant differences.
